allnews.news:
Two weeks after the first beta release, the second beta release is out for download.
Different view layouts are now supported, which eases Quran/Translation browsing very much. These are Quran-only, Translation-only, Mixed and Separate layouts.
Search is more convenient now, since you can see a popup translation for any search result.
In both Translaton-only and Mixed layouts, you can search in the view.
A simple Options menu is added to set general and theme-related configurations.
This release is successfully tested on JRE 1.4.2 and 5. It also works fine on Linux and Mac. A small problem in shell script of the beta 1 release for Mac machines is now fixed. Download!

The first beta release of the Zekr 0.3.0 is available. This release is maily around two features:
Theme management: You can change the current theme, or import more themes into the Zekr
Translation management: you can add a number of different translations to the Zekr
This release is successfully tested on JRE 1.4.2 and 5.
Download!

Zekr 0.2.0 was ported to Mac. Many thanks to Ali Rastegar.
It is tested on Mac OS X Tiger 10.4.5, and JDK 5.0+. Please note that Zekr does not work with JRE 1.4.2 on Mac.
In order to install Zekr on Mac, please see FAQ (Mac).

The 0.2.0 final release of the Zekr project is out!
There is a number of bug-fixes (mainly on search) in adition to some graphical enhancements. More easy navigation on search results and a stable Linux port is also done for this release.
Please see release notes for more details on this release. The next release 0.3.0 beta 1, God willling, will available on March.
In order to install Zekr on Linux, please see FAQ (Linux).
Download!
